typeDescription.name: mx.itam.deiis.hw1.PipelineAnnotation
typeDescription.description: This Type stores the name of the annotator that generates the annotation. Also, this type has a slot (attribute) for storing the confidence evaluated by the creating annotator. All classes from Homework 1 must inherit this Type.

featureDescription.name: pipelineCreator
featureDescription.description: Name of the annotator that generates this annotation

featureDescription.name: confidenceScore
featureDescription.description: the confidence score assigned to the annotation by the component that generates this annotation.

typeDescription.name: mx.itam.deiis.hw1.Sentence
typeDescription.description: Represents a sentence of the input

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description: Text of the sentence. It's clear that you can get the text of this annotation using the begin and end indexes of the uima.cas.Annotation class, but it's more comfortable to get a direct reference to the text

typeDescription.name: mx.itam.deiis.hw1.Question
typeDescription.description: Represents a Question, which it consists of one Sentence

featureDescription.name: numAnswers
featureDescription.description: Number of answers found for this question, without taking in consideration whether or not they are correct

featureDescription.name: precisionAtN
featureDescription.description: The precition@N score indicates the proportion of correct answers from N retrieved answers for this question

featureDescription.name: sentence
featureDescription.description: The sentence that forms the question

featureDescription.name: answers
featureDescription.description: List of possible answers for this question, correct or incorrect

typeDescription.name: mx.itam.deiis.hw1.Answer
typeDescription.description: A possible answer that responds to a specific question

featureDescription.name: isCorrect
featureDescription.description: Indicates if this answer is correct for a specific cuestion

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: A special score that indicates the possible degree of certainty that answer a specific question

featureDescription.name: sentence
featureDescription.description: The sentence that forms the answer

featureDescription.name: question
featureDescription.description: The question that this answer belongs to

typeDescription.name: mx.itam.deiis.hw1.Token
typeDescription.description: Represents a token from a sentence. This token has two indices: the indices inherited from uima.cas.Annotation class, which it points to the absolute reference of the SofA, and the local indices, that points to the indices that a sentence belongs to

featureDescription.name: localStartIdx
featureDescription.description: The index that indicates where the token begins in the sentence

featureDescription.name: localStartEnd
featureDescription.description: The index that indicates where the token ends in the sentence

featureDescription.name: sentence
featureDescription.description: The sentence that this token belongs to

featureDescription.name: ngrams
featureDescription.description: List of n-grams that references to this token

typeDescription.name: mx.itam.deiis.hw1.Ngram
typeDescription.description: Represents a set of consecutive tokens, useful for text retrieval analisys. This Ngram class supports 1-grams, 2-grams and 3-grams.

featureDescription.name: n
featureDescription.description: Number of tokens that contains this n-gram

featureDescription.name: tokens
featureDescription.description: The tokens that forms this n-gram, sorted by appareance order. This array can contain up to 3 tokens
